subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After Chelsea’s elimination from the Champions League last month, the owner Roman Abramovich is said to have confronted the soccer team into which he has sunk a billion dollars and asked: “Are you good players, or just highly paid?”
snippet: After Chelsea’s elimination from the Champions League last month, the owner Roman Abramovich is said to have confronted the soccer team into which he has sunk a billion dollars and asked: “Are you good players, or just highly paid?”
